summary: Adds 4 new Hide/Pelt types to the game: Mammoth, Skeever, Dog, and Horker! (Balanced)
descriptionHtml:
MORE HIDES!



*********** DESCRIPTION **************

This is a simple mod that adds 4 new hide/pelt types to the game (Mammoth, Skeever, Dog, and Horker). They are obtainable by killing those animals then may be used to craft leather using a tanning rack. There is also a chance that you can loot Mammoth hides from a Giants inventory or a Skeever\'s pelt from Bandits.

I tried very hard to make this well balanced and merge well with the rest of the game. I don\'t believe in god items and I\'m one of those players that NEVER use cheats. If a mod feels like it\'s giving me an unfair advantage in the game, I don\'t use it. So my goal with this mod was to make something that I would be willing to use myself and not feel like it\'s making the game any easier, rather just expanding upon it.

I hope you enjoy. Please endorse and leave me any feedback you have.



*********** UPDATES *****************

v1.1
	- Horker Hides have been added to the mod along with the corresponding leather tanning recipe.
	- Skeever pelts can now be collected from Skeever\'s trapped in spider webs.



*********** INSTALL INSTRUCTIONS **************

1) Simply extract files from the More Hides rar file into the Skyrim Data folder.
	C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\Data
2) Play and Enjoy!

NOW ALSO COMPATIBLE WITH THE NMM!
author: Raine
